title: The controversy behind Jerome Powell's Senate testimony, from the VIP dining room to the special elevators
full_text: The controversy behind Jerome Powell's Senate testimony, from the VIP dining room to the special elevators. Jerome Powell says the criminal investigation centers on a June Senate hearing, where he got into a heated exchange over the Fed's renovation plans.. Federal prosecutors have launched a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.ANDREW CABALLERO-REYNOLDS/AFP via Getty Images <ul><li>Jerome Powell says the DOJ criminal investi… [+6637 chars]
